CustomField.description: Indicates the status of this invoice. Will be Open when invoice is created and Cancel if this it is canceled. You can use additional values to manage integration process with backoffice systems.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates the status of this invoice. Will be Open when invoice is created and Cancel if this it is canceled. You can use additional values to manage integration process with backoffice systems.
CustomField.label: Status
